             4=Choice of a political system (specify movement vs parties)
             5=Choice of movement vs parties
             6=Choosing a party to lead
             7=Choosing a president or leader

             9=Express support for Movement
             10=Confuse referendum with party or system
             11=Peace
             12=Government manipulation
             13=Democracy or democratic government
             14=Freedom
             15=Unity
             16=Development
             17=Government or leadership

             94=General positive
             95=Other
             96=No further answer
             97=Correctly skipped
             98=Refused
             99=Missing Data
